import React from 'react'; import {Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage} from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; function Debit() { const initialValue={ select:"", reason:"", amount:"" } const submit = values =>{ console.log(values) } const validationSchema=yup.object({ reason: yup.string().required("Reason Required"), amount: yup.string().required("Amount Required") }) return (
{ select }
) } export default Debit
